"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54df7f5f63687252cbaf0100#post_54df7f5f63687252cbaf0100
[bq="Number1pegasus"]Oh wow, so I'm hearing that Jon Stewart is going to be leaving the the Daily Show like at the end of this year.

So not only is the Colbert Report going to be hosted by someone else now the Daily show is going to be hosted by someone else now. 

And the bits and pieces of my childhood continue to fall. [/bq]
Why is Steve Colbert leaving? I hope it's simply retirement and not the work of those SJWs who tried to bring him down.

topics.body: So, both my 3DS and SSB are being delivered. Thing is, I used two separate sellers for them, and The seller for the game itself is much closer to where I live that the seller for the 3DS. So the game will be arriving before the end of today, why my 3DS won't be here until next week at the earliest.
